useCase.name: Buyer interacts with Market to purchase item from Seller

preconditions.precondition: Buyer and Seller are registered on the Market platform

successEndConditions.condition: Buyer successfully purchases item from Seller

useCase.trigger: Buyer decides to purchase an item from Seller

mainSequence.step: Buyer registers itself as an observer on Market
Seller puts item up for sale on Market
Market notifies Buyer of new items
Buyer receives transferred item from Seller
